synopsis.text: After defeating the Noise threat, the Symphogear wielders return to their normal lives, believing the danger is over. However, a new enemy appears in Yokohama Harbor - a mysterious group of warriors led by the alchemist Carol Malus Dienheim. Armed with strange technology and magical power, Carol and her followers, known as the Autoscorers, seek to initiate the apocalypse for unknown reasons. The Autoscorers possess an unprecedented strength that overwhelms the Symphogear users Hibiki, Tsubasa, and Chris in their first confrontation. Tsubasa breaks off her stay in England to rejoin her allies against this new threat. With the stakes higher than ever before, the Symphogear wielders must push themselves to the limit as they battle Carol and her forces to protect the fate of the world. Outmatched but determined, the girls fight on, willing to sacrifice everything to stop Carol's apocalyptic plan.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
